Title: silverstripe/framework has potential SQL Injection vulnerability in PostgreSQL database connector
Description: A potential SQL injection vulnerability was identified by using the silverstripe/postgresql database adapter. While unlikely to be exploitable, we have patched silverstripe/framework to ensure that table names are safely escaped before being passed to database adapters or user code.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 4.0.0-rc1 before 4.0.6, all versions starting from 4.1.0-rc1 before 4.1.4, all versions starting from 4.2.0-rc1 before 4.2.3
NotImpacted: All versions before 4.0.0-rc1, all versions starting from 4.0.6 before 4.1.0-rc1, all versions starting from 4.1.4 before 4.2.0-rc1, all versions starting from 4.2.3
